comments.body:
Did we decided that we want to do it?
I thought that we want to change set the limits appropriately according to what was written in:  https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/issues/17774#issuecomment-159705367

So to be honest - I would prefer to hold on with this change.
Sure, I just wanted to send it out, so I won't forget about it again :)

this will cause panics, since `violating` is a `map[string]resourceUsagePerContainer`, and `violating[node]` resolves to nil:

```
Oct  9 00:32:33.902: INFO: CPU is too high for /docker-daemon (0.9293734804884075)

â€¢! Panic [15.601 seconds]
Resource usage of system containers
/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/test/e2e/monitor_resources.go:138
  should not exceed expected amount. [It]
  /go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/test/e2e/monitor_resources.go:137

  Test Panicked
  assignment to entry in nil map
  /usr/src/go/src/runtime/panic.go:387

  Full Stack Trace
  /go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/test/e2e/e2e_test.go:140 (0x4f0f6e)
  /usr/src/go/src/testing/testing.go:447 (0x460b0f)
  /usr/src/go/src/runtime/asm_amd64.s:2232 (0x440671)
```
